description:
Sara gets to enjoy her winter break, including (way too many) Christmas parties, a special gift from Livia, and a big trip to the aquarium. Meanwhile, Livia meets up with an old friend, and Brenda prepares for Valentine`s Day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Christmas in Gifu / Hime to Suizokukan / Akujo-tachi no Chousen / Hashi no Shita no Saikai
Christmas in Gifu / The Princess and the Aquarium / The Wicked Women`s Challenge / A Reunion Under the Bridge
クリスマス IN 岐阜 / 姫と水族館 / 悪女たちの挑戦 / 橋の下の再会
